game.name: Match Solitaire
game.description:
This time you get a chance to become the biggest card player in your group! Do you like to accept this challenge and show off the world that nobody can beat you in card games? Join Match Solitaire and be prepared to solve the highly challenging and addictive fresh new card-stacking puzzler! We are damn sure that you would come to us again and again in a search for new card challenges if you give it a single try on our free online game website now.

The seamless gameplay, intuitive controls and colorful graphics of this relaxing solitaire game inspired by Mahjong will keep you engrossed to the screen for long. Get ready to stack cards up, down or both ways to grab 2-of-a-kind matches and become a master of this cute HTML5 card puzzle! Try to put your matching and card-playing abilities to the test to play for as long as possible to create the highest score in the end! Keep matching the two cards of same number or positions to clear the screen every time!

In case of any confusion, you can check out the video attacked below to learn the gameplay of this cool Mahjong Solitaire challenge. No worries if you feel getting bored since we cater to a wide array of free card games that are designed to challenge your brain and logical skills. The best part is that you do not need to install our games to have fun and kill your time. Open them up in your device and allow yourself to play games online in your favorite devices without download!
